item.title: An Analysis of Fouls, By and Drawn, From One Game in the 2016 NBA Regular Season
item.description: req = requests.get("https://www.basketball-reference.com/boxscores/201610260IND.html") box_html = str(req.content) boxes = pd.read_html(box_html) minutes_played = pd.concat([boxes[0][[0, 1]], boxes[2][[0, 1]]]) minutes_played.columns = ["Name", "MP"] minutes_played.drop( minutes_played.index[minutes_played["MP"].str.contains("MP")], inplace=True) minutes_played.drop( minutes_played.index[minutes_played["MP"].str.contains("Did Not Play")], inplace=True) minutes_played.drop( minutes_played.index[minutes_played["Name"].str.contains("Team Totals")], inplace=True) # convert "time remaining in quarter" to "time elapsed in game" def stime_to_float(stime): import datetime dt = datetime.datetime.strptime(stime, "%M:%S") return dt.minute + (dt.second / 60.0) minutes_played["MP"] = minutes_played["MP"].apply(stime_to_float) def short_name(name): first, last = name.split() return "{}. {}".
